description: WRS options for Flavors may be used to customize and manage Nova Flavors.

pci_passthrough:alias.title: PCI Alias
pci_passthrough:alias.description: Specifies the number of PCI devices that are exposed for VM use. The value must be in the form of name:n, where name is the alphanumeric name of the PCI alias and n is the number of devices starting from 1

aggregate_instance_extra_specs:storage.title: Storage Type
aggregate_instance_extra_specs:storage.description: Specifies how storage is instantiated for ephemeral and swap disks, and for the instance boot image if used.

hw:cpu_model.title: VCPU Model
hw:cpu_model.description: select a particular VCPU model for a VM in order to leverage advanced CPU features such as SSE4.2, AES, or AVX on the compute nodes.

hw:numa_nodes.title: Number of NUMA Nodes
hw:numa_nodes.description: Sets the number of virtual NUMA Nodes.

hw:wrs:min_vcpus.title: Minimum Number of CPUs
hw:wrs:min_vcpus.description: Sets the minimum number of virtual CPUs for the flavor to support CPU scaling.

hw:wrs:shared_vcpu.title: Shared VCPU ID
hw:wrs:shared_vcpu.description: Specifies the ID of a virtual CPU scheduled to run on a shared physical CPU in the compute host.

hw:wrs:vswitch_numa_affinity.title: vSwitch NUMA Affinity
hw:wrs:vswitch_numa_affinity.description: Specifies that a NUMA node with a vSwitch core is required or preferred when instantiating the VM.

hw:wrs:live_migration_timeout.title: Live Migration Timeout
hw:wrs:live_migration_timeout.description: The maximum time allowed for live migration. Set to 0 to disable timeout. If unspecified this value defaults to 180 seconds. The value should be in range [120, 800] or 0.

hw:wrs:live_migration_max_downtime.title: Live Migration Max Downtime
hw:wrs:live_migration_max_downtime.description: The maximum downtime allowed for live migration in milliseconds. If unspecified, this value defaults to 500ms. Minimum value is 100ms.

sw:wrs:auto_recovery.title: Instance Auto Recovery
sw:wrs:auto_recovery.description: Determines if the system will automatically recover failed virtual machine instances.

sw:wrs:guest:heartbeat.title: Guest Heartbeat
sw:wrs:guest:heartbeat.description: Enables the Heartbeat API for use by guests on the VM.

sw:wrs:srv_grp_messaging.title: Server Group Messaging
sw:wrs:srv_grp_messaging.description: Enables the VM to communicate with other VMs in the same server group using a messaging API.

hw:hpet.title: Guest Hpet Timer
hw:hpet.description: Enables the Hpet timer for use by guests.
